accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.systemDescription: Manage QR code and ID card access, view access logs and control entry.

account.title: Account Details
account.password_note: For security reasons, we cannot show your actual password. Use the 'Forgot Password' feature to reset it if needed.
account.ticketing_description: Create tickets to get help from HR or Admin
Submit support tickets directly through our internal system. HR can create tickets which will be handled by our IT admin team.
account.support_tip: Tip: Use the Support Tickets page to submit and track your support requests.
account.about_description: TeamSphere is an enterprise-grade HR and time tracking platform designed to streamline workforce management for modern businesses.
account.feature_1: Employee Management with role-based access control
account.feature_2: Time & Attendance tracking with NFC/QR support
account.feature_4: Internal support ticketing system for HR to IT communication

workdayReports.title: Workday Reports
workdayReports.workdayRule: A workday starts at 04:00 AM and ends at 03:59 AM next day
workdayReports.example1: Clock in at 11:00 PM Monday, Clock out at 2:00 AM Tuesday ‚Üí Counts as Monday's workday
workdayReports.example2: Clock in at 1:00 AM Tuesday ‚Üí Counts as Monday's workday (ends at 3:59 AM)
workdayReports.example3: Clock in at 4:00 AM Tuesday ‚Üí Counts as Tuesday's workday
workdayReports.example4: Clock in at 5:00 PM Tuesday, Clock out at 1:00 AM Wednesday ‚Üí Counts as Tuesday's workday
workdayReports.noSummaryData: No summary data available. Please select a date range and click "Summary".

workdayReports.noDataAvailable: No data available. Please select a date range and generate a report.
workdayReports.startDateBeforeEndDate: Start date must be before or equal to end date
